name: Gina Daniel
text: Gracie my instructor is knowledgeable and awesome!!  Facility is very nice! I enjoy very much taking classes here.

resp.text: Thank you, Gina! We enjoy working with you and are glad you're enjoying your training. Keep up the hard work!

name: Laura Rivers
text:
I am ecstatic for the opening of this local Madison “gem”! Gracie and Isaac truly go above and beyond. They are both, very knowledgeable and very passionate about the self-defense style that they teach.

If you are expecting this to be a “wax on, wax off” type of karate, think again! The personalized lesson was practical and relatable without having to paint a fence. And a HUGE bonus, both instructors are patient and encouraging! It’s absolutely all you could ask for in when it comes to learning self-defense!

resp.text: Thank you Laura! We enjoy having you in the studio and know you'll do great things.

name: Bart Roegner
text: Isaac is an excellent teacher. He approaches teaching martial arts with patience and dedication. I highly recommend trying Kenpo with MadCity.

resp.text: Thanks, Bart! We really enjoy teaching you and appreciate your dedication.

name: Matthew Eady
text: An amazing school that teaches a very effective system of self-defense.  Patient, caring instructors who take time to pay the necessary attention to each individual student.  Great for people of all ages and all levels of physical fitness.  I could not recommend a better Kenpo in the North Alabama area.

resp.text: Thanks, Matt! We really enjoy teaching you and love getting to share our art with this area.

name: Randall Rivers
text: Great experience.  I wanted personal training, not a big group.  They offer several different options so you can find the one that works for you.  Good central location, nice facility and friendly, experienced trainers. I really like their focus on practical self-defense.

resp.text: Thanks, Randall! We think you'll excel quickly in our private program. We can't wait to see your progress.

name: Christopher Weaver
text: Amazing place! The instructors are friendly and very detailed in what they reach you.

resp.text: Thanks Christopher! We're glad you're enjoying your training so far - we appreciate all the hard work you put in.

name: Farida Rennie
text: I just took my first self defense lesson and I absolutely loved it. I felt that the lesson was not only fun but also practical. I was able to get a good workout while leaving with skills and improving my balance. I've already signed up for my next session!

resp.text: Thanks, Farida!! We appreciate your desire to learn and can not wait to see your growth in Kenpo.

name: Brian Fields
text: I’ve known Coach Jimmy for many years and he knows how to bring out the best in people. I’m north of 50 with to many Orthopaedic surgeries to list but training at Bama Gym aka Birmingham Boxing and Martial Arts keeps me feeling young and active. If you wanna have fun and learn some pretty cool stuff come visit us. He doesn’t allow bullies or meat heads so no reason to be shy or intimidated just show up and I bet you’ll laugh and get in the best shape of your life.

name: Roshan Khan
text: Jimmy at Bama Gym is a great coach and teacher! He has a wealth of knowledge and is a student of the game! If you want great training, expert knowledge and feel like you are part of a strong community ( think old school Italian family) go check them out!

name: Dr. Brad Hassig
text: Top quality training and equipment.  A fun way to learn real self defense skills while getting in great shape and losing weight. Coach Jimmy has an amazing ability to teach, push you to grow, and have fun in the process. Learn real boxing and self defense skills, not spa boxing!

resp.text: Thanks Dr Brad..it's always a pleasure to have you training!

name: Green Clean
text: Best Experience. Total Workout for the Whole Family (ages 14 and up!) BAMA Gym offers it all- Cardio, Strength and Agility Training.

name: Jakob Lawrence
text: Great coaching! 🥊 Trained with Jimmy for 2 years

resp.text: Thanks Jake!  It was easy you were always a gifted athlete!

name: Tom Burke
text: Great place to workout, with an awesome, very knowledgeable coach!!

name: seth mccart
text: In my opinion there is no better gym I definitely recommend checking it out

resp.text: Thanks Seth 😊 now get back in the Gym!

name: Ben Jackson
text: Best striking coach around. Great workouts  and a proven strikes program. Perfect for beginners to pros.

name: kayla jackson
text: Hands down the best striking coach around! If you are looking for a good work out he is your man!

resp.text: Thanks Kayla it's a pleasure working with you.
